mapper.select: SELECT st.id serve_type_id, st.name serve_type_name, si.id serve_item_id, si.name serve_item_name, si.reference_price, serve.update_time, serve.sale_status, serve.create_time, serve.region_id, serve.price, serve.id, serve.is_hot FROM serve INNER JOIN serve_item si ON serve.serve_item_id = si.id INNER JOIN serve_type st ON si.serve_type_id = st.id WHERE region_id = #{regionId}
